title: The Progressive Attack on Our Children | Betsy DeVos
description:
Michael Knowles is joined by Betsy DeVos who is an American politician, philanthropist, and former government official who served as the 11th United States secretary of education from 2017 to 2021. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
